english_example_sentence: You (pl) don't need to wait for us in this cold weather.
russian_example_sentence: Вам не нужно ждать нас в такую холодную погоду.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz bu soğuk havada bizi beklememeniz lazım.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz bu soğuk havada bizi beklememeniz lazım.
